oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show - Series 4, Program 06
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Series 4, program 6 of a radio show featuring Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys, including Wade Wood (fiddle), Chuck Hatfield (steel guitar), Billy Gray (vocals), and Billy Stewart (vocals), to promote Hank's songbook of his Capitol recordings (songbook commercials included), with announcer Cousin Abner (possibly Johnny Hitt, unconfirmed). Circa 1949-1950.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Cousin Abner) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- Tomorrow Night (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson Songbook commercial (Cousin Abner) -- Hank Thompson introduces Billy Stewart -- (Remember Me) I'm The One Who Loves You (Billy Stewart vocals, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- A Lonely Heart Knows (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson Songbook commercial (Hank Thompson) -- Ragtime Annie (Wade Wood fiddle, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- I Find You Cheatin' On Me (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Closing statement (Cousin Abner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Brazos Valley Boys; Wood, Wade; Stewart, Billy (Bassist)
